name: Wrap Dress
description: Short dress in a woven viscose blend. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, V-neck, and wrapover front with wide ties at one side. Elasticized seam at back of waist. Unlined.

name: Tube Dress with Pleats
description: Short, fitted tube dress in jersey. Concealed zipper at one side with hook-and-eye fastening, shaping darts at back, and pleats at one side of waist for a gently draped effect. Partly lined.

name: Croped Shirt Dress
description: Loose-fit, calf-length dress in woven, croped cotton fabric. Collar, buttons full length of front, and yoke at back with pleat. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and wide cuffs with slit and button. High slit at sides of hem. Unlined.

name: Crinkled Jersey Dress
